Monsoon.name: Coconut
Monsoon.description: Coconut is a tropical perennial crop mainly grown in the Monsoon season on coastal sandy loam soils with high humidity.
Monsoon.diseases: Bud rot, Stem bleeding, Leaf blight, Root wilt
Monsoon.medicine: Copper oxychloride, Bordeaux mixture, Neem-based formulations

Monsoon.name: Rice
Monsoon.description: Rice is the staple crop of Monsoon season, requiring abundant water and high humidity. It grows best in clayey or loamy soil with good water retention.
Monsoon.soil: Clayey to loamy soil with good water retention
Monsoon.diseases: Blast, Bacterial leaf blight, Sheath blight

Monsoon.name: Kidneybeans
Monsoon.description: Kidney beans are grown mainly in the Monsoon season on well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter.
Monsoon.diseases: Anthracnose, Rust, Mosaic virus, Root rot

Monsoon.name: Mothbeans
Monsoon.description: Moth beans are drought-resistant pulses mainly grown in the Monsoon season on sandy or loamy soils.
Monsoon.diseases: Powdery mildew, Yellow mosaic virus, Rust

Monsoon.name: Sugarcane
Monsoon.description: Sugarcane is a major Monsoon crop requiring warm climate and fertile soils with good irrigation.
Monsoon.soil: Loamy or clay loam soil rich in organic matter

Monsoon.name: Jute
Monsoon.description: Jute is an important fibre crop grown during Monsoon, thriving in alluvial soils with high rainfall.
Monsoon.medicine: Seed treatment with Thiram, Neem-based fungicides

Monsoon.name: Coffee
Monsoon.description: Coffee is a tropical plantation crop mainly grown in the Monsoon season under shade on fertile well-drained loamy soils.
Monsoon.soil: Loamy, well-drained, rich in organic matter
Monsoon.diseases: Coffee rust, Root rot, Dieback, Berry borer
Monsoon.medicine: Copper fungicides, Neem oil sprays, Triazole fungicides

Monsoon.name: Turmeric
Monsoon.description: Turmeric is a spice crop cultivated in Monsoon season, requiring moist loamy soils.
Monsoon.soil: Well-drained sandy loam or clay loam

Monsoon.name: Ginger
Monsoon.description: Ginger thrives well in Monsoon under humid conditions and well-drained soils.
Monsoon.soil: Sandy loam or clay loam rich in humus

Monsoon.name: Soybean
Monsoon.description: Soybean is a legume crop widely grown in Monsoon season, requiring well-drained soils.

Monsoon.name: Paddy
